scripts.clean: sudo rm -rf node_modules packages/client/node_modules packages/server/node_modules bun.lock packages/client/bun.lock packages/server/bun.lock packages/client/dist packages/server/dist
scripts.deps: npm install -no-audit -no-fund  && cd packages/client && npm install -no-audit -no-fund  && cd ../server && npm install -no-audit -no-fund
scripts.build: npm run format && cd packages/client && npm run build-only && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.upd: npm-check -gu && npm-check -u && cd packages/client && npm-check -u && cd ../server && npm-check -u
scripts.format: cd ./packages/client/ && npm run format && cd ../../packages/server && npm run format
scripts.version: cd ./packages/client/ && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && cd ../server/ && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run docker-build
scripts.start-dev: export DATE=$(date +'%s') ;export VERSION=$(cat ./packages/server/package.json | jq .version -r) ; docker stop vopidy ; docker compose rm -f ; docker compose -f ./docker-compose-dev.yaml up -d
scripts.start-dev-build: export DATE=$(date +'%s') ;export VERSION=$(cat ./packages/server/package.json | jq .version -r); docker stop vopidy ; docker compose rm -f ; docker compose -f ./docker-compose-dev.yaml up -d --build
